messages.messageBody:
That would be my 5-y.o. daughter Siân next to Marty :-) I'm so glad
Mary took that picture because we only took video. Some of my
unschooling friends are geeking out along with me that she's on Sandra's
page ;-)
Alyson

<<<Sandra, I just wanted to tell you how much I LOVE that picture you
have of Marty there on that page...the one with the tiny girl. I loved
it so much (I think I saw it on Crystal's? blog first) I saved it to my
computer. I just LOVE LOVE LOVE it!; ) Ria>>>

messages.subject: additions to my site
messages.msgSnippet: So... Sometimes I make two or three new pages in a week.  Sometimes I just add something cool and don t tell anyone. There is an announcements list, and
messages.messageBody:
So...
Sometimes I make two or three new pages in a week. Sometimes I just
add something cool and don't tell anyone.

There is an announcements list, and sometimes I remember to mention
something here on Always Learning. Lots of news, not much organization.

So I've changed my plan again.

Site news will be available two ways.
http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/
and by e-mail by joining
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AlwaysLearning
(you can send an e-mail to:)
SandraDodd-subscribe@yahoogroups.com


I have used two other repositories of announcements and both are now
abandoned. But if you're looking to discover obscure unschooling
writings you might have missed, maybe check one of these:

http://sandradodd.com/announcements (2004-2005)

http://sandradodd.com/blog (2006 and early 2007)

I'm going with the blogspot replacement because it's easier to manage.
That blog used to be for something else, so the first few entries
won't match purpose and tone, but I figured I might as well leave
them there. I might turn them into articles someday...

Sandra
